title: Riot Wasted their Rework for Fiddle...
body:
Let it be known that one of the greatest proponents for Fiddlestick's rework, BonzaiBuddy, demanded one thing and one thing only....

https://i.imgur.com/JiEtAEn.gifv

Do you see a gun anywhere?

https://i.imgflip.com/3dw49w.jpg

I expect at least 150% more guns before his release.

Edit: Guys, now that we have Riot's attention, let's keep BonzaiBuddy's dream alive! Let's make the Harbinger of Doom the Gunslinger of Doom!

Btw here is the OP: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/lEnnmqHA-vote-fiddlesticks-so-that-they-can-give-fiddlesticks-the-one-thing-he-truly-needs

https://i.imgflip.com/3dy9sa.jpg

replies.body: _scribbles notes down_
Does it wake you up at nights knowing that all Riot employees must have specifically "Riot" at the start of their name, preventing you from attaining the divine privilege of being named Rito Pls?
O rly
https://i.imgur.com/tQQnb84.gif[/img]
**Interlocutioner, Reav3, WAAARGHbobo, Meddler, Carnival Knights, and others:** O RLY
To be fair, It would be hard to say Riot Kindl

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YaTZgEcA,comment-id=000c00000001,timestamp=2019-10-22T04:11:43.106+0000)
>
> O rly

Guys just make fiddle.. member berries. 
ok.. only reason i don't pick him.. is he is too easy.

But he must still be like a joke on 2 legs. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
What kind of power is this?!

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YaTZgEcA,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2019-10-21T20:28:07.222+0000)
>
> Does it wake you up at nights knowing that all Riot employees must have specifically "Riot" at the start of their name, preventing you from attaining the divine privilege of being named Rito Pls?

Asking the real questions here
Wow! Hey Riot Pls, all credit to BonzaiBuddy. He is the one who came up with the joke. You guys are an awesome company!
This is the kind of stuff I like to see in the boards{{sticker:poppy-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pls,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YaTZgEcA,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2019-10-21T19:50:50.147+0000)
>
> _scribbles notes down_

He kills people just so he can steal their guns, he has a gun collection, you gotta get Bandito Fiddlesticks recall have a gun rack that he checks yo

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainAntiHeroz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YaTZgEcA,comment-id=000c0001,timestamp=2019-10-22T00:58:29.802+0000)
>
> He kills people just so he can steal their guns, he has a gun collection, you gotta get Bandito Fiddlesticks recall have a gun rack that he checks yo

Bandito Fiddlesticks should just be reworked into High Noon Fiddlesticks tbh.
Ever see Afro Samurai? Was just thinking about Justice...

> [{quoted}](name=L Psy Kongroo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YaTZgEcA,comment-id=000c00010000,timestamp=2019-10-22T02:34:03.544+0000)
>
> Bandito Fiddlesticks should just be reworked into High Noon Fiddlesticks tbh.

pretty sure they're in the same universe, same with Sheriff Cait etc

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainAntiHeroz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YaTZgEcA,comment-id=000c0001,timestamp=2019-10-22T00:58:29.802+0000)
>
> He kills people just so he can steal their guns, he has a gun collection, you gotta get Bandito Fiddlesticks recall have a gun rack that he checks yo

That Gun Rack killed Darnell Simmons. :P
Bandito Fiddlesticks shoots bouncing guns instead of crows if he targeted a cowboy/cowgirl/cowother with his silence

THIS! OMG! TY! for proving someone at Riot actually looks at board posts. 

I understand Riot employees dont have time to discuss all the topics posted here(plus some of the topics here are dumb af), but if they at least left some sort of message like this acknowledging that they read the post, whenever a rioter reads the post, that would definitely create a much better feeling in the community, that Riot actually hears and attempts to listen to what we have to say.

rito then just proceeds to mass mark every post as read without actually reading it
in a few years we get the prestige Riot approved icon, which is an upgrade to the standard "Read by Riot" icon only for 100 Prestige Points each
Ok. He can have one gun, but it must be his head.

I haven't got a brain and soon... Neither will you
_\*Headshots landing a headshot\*_
i just let out the most crackhead laugh of all time

> [{quoted}](name=Pika Fox,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YaTZgEcA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-10-21T14:53:15.773+0000)
>
> Ok. He can have one gun, but it must be his head.

What about Praetorian Fiddle? More guns?
150% more of 0 is still 0

Ok.

Then they need to add one gun.

AND THEN 150% more guns.

Then he would have one gun and then half of a gun!

150% more of 1 is actually 2.5. So 2 and a half guns xD

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
2 and a half men :P
This is why I make memes not math XD
And really, this was BonzaiBuddy's meme so it's worse XD
Agreed.

> [{quoted}](name=ZackTheWaffleMan,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=YaTZgEcA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-10-21T17:40:55.945+0000)
>
> 150% more of 0 is still 0

https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/909/991/48c.jpg

When you realize that Crittlesticks may never be a thing again after the rework.

https://newfastuff.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/nkIwtPv.png
why does he look like he walked out of a cryptid's nightmare tho?

imagine the skin potential
https://i.imgur.com/6MXQklU.png

P.S: Thanks for the shout out :^)
Hey you were the one who created it! I am happy you get to see people are interested in YOUR idea :)
i choked a bit when the fiddle started shooting
i like this
When he Ults there will now be a cannon that comes out of his mouth and shoots people as he spins around in his storm of crows XD
Nah just let the cannon stick out of his mouth like a Borreload Dragon architecture in Yugioh LOL
Maybe a hidden Xenomorph style gun is inside his throat and comes out when he screeeeee's
Imagine invading a fiddlesticks, you see him but he does a 180, whips out a revolver and just guns you down.

Do I really need to remind you all?

The Scarecrow has a gun in the Wizard of OZ.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p9hcXm2vr5I

It's perfect! It makes perfect sense!
And for his neutral special, he wields a GUN.
This is stupid, they really shouldn't give him any guns.

Please look at the board it was posted.

Memes & Games

OP found here:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/lEnnmqHA-vote-fiddlesticks-so-that-they-can-give-fiddlesticks-the-one-thing-he-truly-needs

At the time, it was the most popular forum around the rework poll XD
He should have been dual wielding fiddlegunchucks.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i1qIT-INew4
Well you made me laugh XD
XD
I propose that if he still throws birds, those birds also shoot.
